channel.title: A "n00b" question that i have about my HybridScape and OSX :eek: :(
channel.description:
Hello, i don't mean to spam or appear not to have read the stickys, but i have a few questions 1. first and formost i would realy appreciate if someone could tell me or direct me to a tut on how to give hp to monsters you create with the ::npc #### command or in the autospawn.cfg file. please include specific line i can "copy and paste" into needed class or java file, or a link to a tut. 2. This may be a bit simpler. I need to know how to Compile or "build" server sources once i have d-l'ed them on mac osx (10.4.8 ppc) any help here would be AWSOME!!!
please don't say "Get a pc!!!" as i am 15 and w/o a job or source of income.
thx so much if you can help me! Update: i modified the npc.crg but they still have no hp. can someone PLEASEEEE help ME!?!?!!?!!?

item.title: A "n00b" question that i have about my HybridScape and OSX :eek: :(
item.dc:creator: @vergil505 vergil505
item.description:
@vergil505 wrote:

Hello, i don’t mean to spam or appear not to have read the stickys, but i have a few questions

  1. first and formost i would realy appreciate if someone could tell me or direct me to a tut on how to give hp to monsters you create with the ::npc #### command or in the autospawn.cfg file. please include specific line i can “copy and paste” into needed class or java file, or a link to a tut.
  2. This may be a bit simpler. I need to know how to Compile or “build” server sources once i have d-l’ed them on mac osx (10.4.8 ppc) any help here would be AWSOME!!!

please don’t say “Get a pc!!!” as i am 15 and w/o a job or source of income.

thx so much if you can help me!
Update: i modified the npc.crg but they still have no hp. can someone PLEASEEEE help ME!?!?!!?!!?
